content.rendered:
Tara and Bryan tied the knot on The Bridge Building rooftop with elegant decor and garden-inspired details full of whimsical vibes. 

This sweet pair is originally from New York and moved to Nashville together a little over four years ago. Bryan popped the question after the big move, at none other than Arrington Vineyards!

Wanting to show off their new city, it was important that the venue be close to downtown, and The Bridge Building was the perfect place. 

Tara and Bryan shared a sweet first look outside before saying their vows on the rooftop. The space was set with cascading pink drapery, greenery arrangements, and moody candle lighting. 

Tara stunned in an off-the-shoulder ivory mermaid gown with stunning embroidered florals. Her gals rocked matching champagne dresses, while Bryan and his men were dressed in deep blue suits, perfect for this spring wedding. 

After the two said “I do,” guests snacked on mini chicken and waffles, hot chicken biscuits, and fried green tomatoes while enjoying a signature cocktail created with tequila and lavender. 

The Cumberland space was set with all white linens, industrial string lights, and bright floral centerpieces. 

When guests found their seats, a plated dinner service began with selections of rosemary maple pork chops with sour cream whipped potatoes and broccolini, blackberry chicken with rosemary roasted fingerling potatoes and roasted heirloom carrots, and rigatoni primavera. Yum!

The night came to a close with lots of dancing, laughter, and a classic send-off under the pedestrian bridge. For more details on Tara and Bryan’s whimsical wedding day, keep scrolling!

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: May 29, 2021
Happy Couple: Tara and Bryan
Location: The Bridge Building
Guest Count: 140
Colors: Neutrals, Pink, & White
Photographer: John Myers Photography 
Florist: Forget Me Not Designs
Dress: Galia Lahav
Cake: Publix
Rentals: EventWorks + Quest Events
DJ: 3rd Coast Entertainment
Catering & Bar: The Bridge Building
Production Design: Nashville Lighting & Production
Planning: Cailin + Kayla | IH

excerpt.rendered: A romantic wedding with elegant decor and a touch of whimsy at The Bridge Building.
